actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill providing for the erection of a monument in the National Cemetery at Arlington, Va., to members of the Armed Forces who served in Southeast Asia during the Vietnam era and who are missing in action.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to have a monument erected in the National Cemetery at Arlington, Virginia, to members of the Armed Forces who served in Southeast Asia during the Vietnam era and are missing in action.

titles.title: A bill providing for the erection of a monument in the National Cemetery at Arlington, Va., to members of the Armed Forces who served in Southeast Asia during the Vietnam era and who are missing in action.
